#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int 
ll a[1999999]={0};

int main()
{
	ll n,p;
	scanf("%lld", &n);
	ll i,j;
	for(i =2; i<=sqrt(1999999);i++)
	{
		if(a[i]==0)
		{
			for(j = 2*i;j<=1999999;j = j+i)
			{
				a[j]=1;
			}
		}
	}

	
	while(n)
	{	
		if (a[n]==0)
		{
			p = n;
			vector<int> v;
			while(p>0)
			{
				int r = p%10;
				v.push_back(r);
				p = p/10;	
			}
			int k = 0;
			for(i = 0; i<(v.size()/2);i++)
			{
				if(v[i]!=v[v.size()-i-1])
					k=1;
			}
			if(k==0)
				{
					cout<<n<<endl;
					return 0;
				}
		}
		n++;
	}
	return 0;
}
